mapper.insert: insert into tipstar(boardId, accountId, star, reg_date) values(#{boardId}, #{accountId}, #{star}, now())
mapper.select: select a.boardId, b.subject, a.star from (select boardId, SUM(star) as star from tipstar WHERE boardId group by boardId ORDER BY SUM(star) DESC limit 5) a, tipboard b where a.boardId = b.boardId order by star desc;
select EXISTS (select star from tipstar where accountId = #{accountId} and boardId = #{boardId})
